ALGO SANDBOX

  • Game of Life
  • Particle Animations
  • Maze Generator & Path Finder

Hello! I'm Jonatan and this is sort of a playground of mine, dabbling with data visualisation and algorithms which I've found fascinating and fun recently.

In it's current state it works best on desktop, and there are lots still under development so don't expect too much.

You can find my other development stuff here.
